title: Add a Meal Plan to Park Ticket
description: A customer who has already purchased theme park tickets wants to add a one-day meal plan.

tasks.description: Retrieve the customer's existing ticket order.
Explain the different meal plan options and their prices.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly presents the meal plan choices.

tasks.description: Add the selected meal plan to the customer's booking and process the payment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully adds the meal plan and updates the customer's tickets.
